task1_evaluation.comments: Both answers must be correct to pass this task.

task2_evaluation.comments: All three metrics must be within ±5% of the correct values to pass this task.

task3_evaluation.comments: Both channel identifications must be correct to pass this task.

task4_evaluation.comments: At least 2 out of 3 variance calculations must be within ±0.05 of the correct values to pass this task.

task5_evaluation.comments: Budget allocation must sum to $100,000, allocate at least $10,000 to each channel, use increments of $5,000, and show a logical relationship to performance.

overall_comments: Candidate must successfully complete at least 4 out of the 5 tasks to pass the exam.
